metadata.name: THE CROWN
metadata.description:
To the current holder of this NFT, King of New York request info to unlock extras: https://nft.barronclaiborne.art/verify

---

The original crown worn by The Notorious BIG in 1997, sold for an astounding $600,000 USD at Sotheby's back in 2020, solidifying its status as the most iconic artifact in Hip-Hop history! This open edition NFT grants you access to an augmented reality filter for Instagram and Facebook: Wear THE CROWN, take photos and videos, share them with the community and become part of the KONYs legacy. A custom 3D viewer brings the NFT to life on screens of any size, including edition info and my signature. Both features are accessible through the secret metadata available after collecting.

- Open Edition
- With Augmented Reality filter
- With functional 3D viewer
- ðŸ”’ Once purchased, [view AR filter here](https://nft.barronclaiborne.art/verify)
